name: Untitled Escape(1)
description:
Note*** game made in under 24 hours.  (like 10 hours) 

will fix bugs video glitches  etc after submissions I had no free time -_- . I wanted to submit something THO! :>

  • Look Around: Mouse
  • Walk: WASD Buttons
  • Interact: E Button
  • Zoom: F Button
  • Crouch: Left Control Button (CTRL)
  • Restart level: [TAB] Button
  • Quit the D*mn Game: Alt+F4
